page.title: 14MEDIA IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: A Holton newsagents sells a variety of {newspapers,}and the{Target}and{Gazette are free. There is a{local Radio {Station,}which features a bit about Holton-le-Clay. In Holton-le-Clay there is a little{magazine}called the {Holton News.}We did some research on Media, and we found that{17 people}in Holton-le-Clay listened to{Radio {Humberside}and{17 people}listened to {Viking Radio,}which is{39.5%}in both cases.{12 people}listen to{Radio {Lincolnshire. 30 people}watch the T.V. programme{Calendar. 26 people}watch the T.V. programme{Look North. 33 {people}read the{Gazette. 35 people read the{Target. 34 people}read the {Grimsby Evening Telegraph}and{34 {people}read the{Holton News. 43 people answered questions.
